custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM WikiPage WHERE (nodeId = ?) AND (createDate [$CREATE_DATE_COMPARATOR$] ?) AND (head = ?)
SELECT {WikiPage.*} FROM WikiPage WHERE (nodeId = ?) AND (createDate [$CREATE_DATE_COMPARATOR$] ?) AND (head = ?) ORDER BY createDate DESC
SELECT {WikiPage.*} FROM WikiPage WHERE (resourcePrimKey NOT IN( SELECT classPK FROM TagsAsset WHERE classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.WIKI.MODEL.WIKIPAGE$] ))
SELECT {WikiPage.*} FROM WikiPage INNER JOIN WikiNode ON (WikiNode.nodeId = WikiPage.nodeId) WHERE (WikiPage.uuid_ = ?) AND (WikiNode.groupId = ?)
